Aonach Meadhoin

Hear pronunciation Press to hear pronunciation

Aonach Meadhoin is a Munro on the Brothers ridge on the north side of Glen Shiel. It is situated between fine Sgurr a Bhealach Dheirg and the prominent Top of Sgurr an Fhuaraill.

 You have not climbed Aonach Meadhoin.

Region: Kintail

Altitude: 1001 metres

Users' Rating:
  • Currently 3.28/5
Rating: 3.3/5 (47 votes cast)

You must be registered and signed-in to vote

Detailed route description and map

Sgurr a Bhealaich Dheirg and the Brothers of Kintail

Other routes and challenges

The Brothers Ridge route can be extended in both directions. Including Ciste Dhubh and perhaps Am Bathach is feasible, although there is a low bealach. Extending the route westwards to continue over the Five Sisters, on the other hand, makes for a completely epic excursion only for the very fittest.

Walker-friendly accommodation in the area

Kintail Hotels

Kintail B&B

Kintail Cottages

Kintail Hostels
